Name: Sakura Hime 3
About the game: Badge Game Introduction You have just graduated school and have miraculously landed your first job as a butler for the luxury apartments 'Sakura Gardens.' Replacing the owner who took a leave of absence, you arrive here anxiously. You are greeted by a mysterious girl who calls herself 'Sakura Hime'! As the first human accepted into this place, you are eager to begin your work. Your main goal is to become an excellent butler who gives the girls all the pleasure and happiness they need! Special Features One-handed mode 10 unique girls to experience
